name: carbo-ai-web-idea-four
description: Carbon Track AI - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node app.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client

author: Ismail
